content: It's great to hear that prince's music had a positive impact on you and your lgbtq+ friends, helping to create an atmosphere of unity and acceptance. "purple rain" remains one of his most iconic and celebrated works, and it's clear that its themes of love, loss, and acceptance resonated deeply with many people across different backgrounds and identities. prince's legacy as a musician and advocate for freedom and individuality continues to inspire and uplift communities all over the world.
